item.title: About
item.description:
I am a Technical Program Manager and Cloud Architect with over 5 years of experience driving infrastructure modernization and enterprise-grade cloud transformations. My background is rooted in the practical application of cloud technologies; I hold an AWS Certified Solutions Architect â€“ Associate certification and a Postgraduate Certificate in Cloud Architecture from the University of Texas at Austin.

Currently serving as a Director of Information Technology, I specialize in navigating the complex lifecycle of cloud migration. I successfully led a full-scale network overhaul that included migrating on-premise servers and domain services to Azure Active Directory, significantly improving security and scalability for hundreds of users. Beyond infrastructure, I design and deploy specialized cloud solutions, such as AWS containerized environments for practical programming applications and cyber ranges for technical training.
